txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have heard tell that you are looking to make your mark and presence known... admirable. I think that I may be able to assist you with this, but it will take some work.

Burt Nine-tales
'It is good to see you, friend. I think that you will do nicely and be welcome in assisting a friend.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Burt Nine-tales
Burt Nine-tales sent you a letter requesting that you visit him at the Prancing Pony in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Burt Nine-tales at the Prancing Pony in Bree.
